article_title: ‘Junk insurance’ comes back to haunt its policyholders
article_text: April Capil has mixed feelings about the national outcry over canceled health insurance policies. Like millions of Americans, Capil thought she had solid individual health insurance. Then she got sick and found that her coverage was woefully inadequate.

article_metadata.news-keywords: affordable care act, junk insurance, HealthMarkets, Inc.
article_metadata.title: ‘Junk insurance’ comes back to haunt its policyholders | McClatchy DC

article_summary:
April Capil has mixed feelings about the national outcry over canceled health insurance policies.
Like millions of Americans, Capil thought she had solid individual health insurance.
Then she got sick and found that her coverage was woefully inadequate.
